website_summaries.verdict: Low price point for a nice looking casting rod that uses multiple configurations to give you the versatility you need.
pros: Gives you a cork handle on the rod for an excellent level of performance and grip
Popular casting rod design that has been around for a long time with good results
Rod offers a higher level of sensitivity than you may expect to find in this price range, ensuring you can feel even slight nibbles from smaller fish
cons: Made more for lightweight baits and lures
Some questions about longevity and durability

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Got this one (7' medium) instead of getting another Berkley lightning rod. Has a slower action than my 6'6" medium lightning rod, which in my opinion makes it better suited for a nice closed face reel. I put my abu pro max baitcaster on it and it cast about half as well compared to the lightning rod it was on. I have to put a ton of weight on it to get a decent cast. For the money it's definitely good. Give it a good bend test after delivery. Mine flexes just fine and will easily hold a fish. Don't wait to find out that it was damaged in shipment with a fish on it.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Langley

customer_reviews.title: Cherrywood Rods Always Deliver Great Performance!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a friend after his was stolen. . .He was despondent as it was his favorite rod! I have had a medium light for over thirty years and recently landed a 20 pound cat. . . It was bent in a complete u shape and I thought for sure it would snap. . . It didn't even creak or pop! Even after all these years it still performs even when it is asked to do way more than what it was designed to do. . .Awesome rods!
customer_reviews.author: Cuban Comanche

customer_reviews.title: Bent Guides
customer_reviews.text: Love the Berkley cherrywood rod.. I've own an other one that came with my abu Garcia black max... this is the same rod.. the only issue i had was every Guide was bent when i received the rod though Amazon... after bending evey single one with a pair of pliers, it was good.. might buy at store next time so i won't run into this issue.... didn't send back because i needed this rod for a fishing trip.. so it was needed for the trip
customer_reviews.author: Anitra Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice light rod.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and beautiful little rod. Has a really nice action. I paired the rod with a little Pflueger President closed face spinning reel for light fishing for panfish and trout. So far it has performed perfectly and today took my second limit of trout with it. It performed perfectly. I do like it. I would advise using it for light work and treating it Kindly as it could break. Its for light work and not heavy bruisers or rough handling.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nymeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great rods at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these rods and have had god luck with all of them. I pamper my fishing gear by keeping it clean, by installing rod covers by Midwest (I believe they are the best I have found, the weave is tight and prevents small eyelets from getting through the weave.) and I oil my reels and keep my gear ready to fish. I have paid more for rods of less quality. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Rod Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I used my Cherrywood HD Casting Rod exactly one time. The first time I set the hook on a fish the top part of the rod snapped in two. It was not an extremely large fish maybe a 4 lb. bass. These rods look nice, and maybe I just got one with a weak spot in it. However, I have read other reviews where it happened to others as well. I guess you get what you pay for or in this case even less. i would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive, Light and Priced Right!
customer_reviews.text: Puts a beating on the walleyes! Super sensitive and light in the hand. Fast action and just the right give. Snagged a huge sturgeon as well and had this sucker about bent in the circle. Awesome rod especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice rod. I have a abu garcia black max ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rod. I have a abu garcia black max paired with it. It is great for bass fishing. Nice action and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Robert Touchtone

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod for the price and quality built.
customer_reviews.text: I live these rods. They are cheap but the build quality is excellent. I have 3 of them and each have been great. Caught a huge carp on the 7ft medium heavy and handled it beautifully. Caught many bass/pike on the 7' medium and the 6.6' medium heavy baitcaster.
customer_reviews.author: Ercans

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say other then, the Berkeley Cherrywood has been my favorite for many years. I have had many other fishing poles bought for me as gifts, but I still prefer my Berkeley Cherrywood over all...
customer_reviews.author: Sally Harper

customer_reviews.title: Best 21$ Bait Casting Rod...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod! It might not be as good for a pro fisherman as a Lew's rod, but at 21 bucks (casting, 2 piece, 6'6", medium) it's tough to find a better rod for the money with cork grips. I can't really speak to whether 1 piece is better than 2, but the 1 piece is nearly 2.5× the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: If they don't arrive broken they are good rods.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and one arrived broken in half so I returned for exchange. The replacement arrived and looked ok but apparently was cracked because when it was bent it broke. I will return and purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Zexel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rod for kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod for kayak fishing. Very tough, handles mad 30"+ blues with full control. Very light. Real cork feels good in your hands. Plain stainless steel guides take tons of abuse, show no signs of wear. Butt is perfect length, not too short or long.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: For the money this product is pretty darn hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: For the money this product is pretty darn hard to beat. It's not a "Pro" level rod, but I've caught plenty of decent fish on this rod without any issues whatsoever. It's amazing that they can sell it and ship it for the cost that it is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod (thanks for noticing)
customer_reviews.text: First rod was delivered in multiple pieces (not good). Replacement came swiftly. I put a blackmax reel on it. Feels pretty good. Seems to have plenty of backbone. Sensitive enough for jigs, worms. Catches bass. Enough said! Oh yeah, it didn't cost $200.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: this a bulky rod for the action it calls for, the eyelets are not aligned which inst a huge deal but gives a fit and finish negative. for the price cant complain too much, just wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse wells

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2 piece 6’6” rod, it’s a pretty good rod for the price. Stays together nicely, easy to break down, has good bend to it, looks great and fits nicely in my hand. It’s definitly a rod I could use all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sagerods

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly made .
customer_reviews.text: Wow this rod is awesome light weight perfect for any reel . I have bought other high dollar rod’s who’s eyes have easily broken off . You can feel a fly on this rod & for the price you can’t beat it .
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R.

customer_reviews.title: slick lookin rod
customer_reviews.text: im heading out to hit the local lake in a week or so i cant wait to use it. it feels great and looks great it got shipped fast with no issues. you kinda get scared, maybe the eyes are gonna be broke or bent but no problems at all will use them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fit finish + good value
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish of these rods is great and they are a good value. Fast action. Also accept a wider reel seat than some of my other fw casting rods. 4 stars for 7 guides 7' rod; 8-9 less 'line sag' casting, more distance.
customer_reviews.author: William  L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rod at an unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: These are Amazing rods at an unbeatable price. I have several of these and have never had any problems with any of them. Definitely a favorite in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: ITS A QUALITY ROD
customer_reviews.text: GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT LIKE IT ALOT WOULD BUY IT AGAIN BUT NOT A WHOLE LOT OF CONTROL ON THE SIDE CAST BUT OTHER WISE A GOOD ROD
customer_reviews.author: Kaden#3

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong go to.
customer_reviews.text: 20+ years and still my favorite rod. Matches up with my St. Croixs and is tough as nails. At 25% the price of competition rods, ill just take a boat full of these.
customer_reviews.author: Chastyfreeze

customer_reviews.title: Snapped the second day it was used
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this rod twice now.. the top half snapped today while trying to pull up from a snag. Very disappointed. I tried to contact seller, but the message fails every time. I wouldn’t recommend this rod, unless I just have a “bad” one.
customer_reviews.author: ant

customer_reviews.title: I was very much impressed by the construction of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very much impressed by the construction of this Rod . It far supersedes what the local box stores sell with what is suppose to be the same Rod excluding model number by only a slight difference for the same cost. I'm beginning to think that lesser made rods are made for box stores only. I only ordered one but will order more SOON.
customer_reviews.author: R E L

customer_reviews.title: It came as single piece rod and I liked everything about it
customer_reviews.text: It came as single piece rod and I liked everything about it. Unfortunately, 4th guide (from the rod tip) had a missing ceramic ring insert that rendered the rod unusable. I am returning the defective rod and eagerly looking forward to receive the replacement. I am most likely going to order another one for my surplus reel.
customer_reviews.author: Sali

customer_reviews.title: Best rod for the money bar none.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best rod for the money bar none. I have KVD custom rods that cost $200 that are not any better than these $22 Berkley rods. I now have four because they are lightweight & much easier to fish. If you are thinking of getting one you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Dillow

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived broken in the box, absolutely disappointed. I was really lookin forward to this rod. My first Berkley rod and its useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Weight and rod diameter as well as butt of rod (quite short) that would be for a small to small/medium spinning reel - bought because some put a small bait caster on it (Penn No.9) possibly so also of a newer small size low profile bail caster but for sure not one as large as a Penn 209 (2/0) is just not compatable (I just tried that).
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: My only disappointment is with the quality of the cork grip
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for the price. By no means is this the "best" rod I have, but in terms of value for money it definitely ranks up there. My only disappointment is with the quality of the cork grip.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. I understand thatthings can get broken in shipping, but it is not a good sign for a fishing pole to show up broken in two pieces. How can I trust this priduct not to snap with a fish
customer_reviews.author: Airman H

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: I wont give a poor review on the item. I like the berkley cherrywood. A good rod for cheap money. Just too bad it was shipped in a flat box that was obviously intended to be shaped as a square tube, not a flat. It arrived with a broken tip and bent flat guides
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey h.

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: Wire fish hook holder at handle end of pole catches the line coming off of the real but I trimmed it off! Otherwise I really like the pole
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great medium light action, excellent feel. Now if i could just find the fish. . .
customer_reviews.author: Miccol

customer_reviews.title: Inferior guides.
customer_reviews.text: Very much like rod but was very disappointed that tip top insert fell out and was lost. Product under 30 days old but shipping back seems like it would be an issue but I'll try if I can get a box. Reached out to Berkley for help.
customer_reviews.author: fuyafada

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: There is no reinforcement support for the rod in the cardboard box. It was broken when it arrived and so was it's replacement...
customer_reviews.author: Tara G Kelton

customer_reviews.title: Just say no!
customer_reviews.text: Received a broken rod. My 4 year old was upset. Waited an extra 2 days for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah S

customer_reviews.title: I love these rods
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mine for a couple of years and I love it so much I bought my sister a set. 7ft medium light for spinning and 7ft medium heavy for bait casting.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad rod
customer_reviews.text: I was putting the line on, just pulled the line to fix the lure it snapped and the upper half became three pieces. I am returning it after 20 minutes of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ramia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value and performance
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price or quality of this Berkley rod. I do with it came in a heavier action and supported a higher pound line but over all this rod is a steal. I now have one for my baitcaster and spinning reel.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Wow, nice rod great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty particular about fishing gear, and I was hesitant to buy such an inexpensive rod... but wow am I impressed. For $25 a rod of this feel and apparent quality? I am going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Decent Fishing Rod
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box to find multiple eyelets bent or twisted and zero packing material. Rod was damaged but not to the point where I couldn’t bend things back into alignment. As for the rod, this is my second one. The last one broke at the tip. It’s good for what it is. I would buy another but maybe pick up from a local store so I can see what I’m buying.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Smith

customer_reviews.title: Damn good rod!
customer_reviews.text: I love the action this rod gives. It's just right.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light so you can cast all day. Good choice if you want to stay cheap cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap (cost) but great! (quality)
customer_reviews.text: This is solid for surf casting and even handles the hefty calico of the coastal pacific. I have owned two, and the only reason the first broke is because I REALLY tested it trying to pull my swimbait out of a massive kelp column, and broke the tip. I did this MANY times before it actually broke. With patience in a snag of kelp, this rod will last a long time. I love it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk dont by it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the pole for the frist time and caught a one pound speckled trout and the tip broke off was very disappointed in The quality of this pole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually had a fish on it yet but it seems decent paired up with my pro max. If not, it's not like I'm out any money.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rod
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great rod. I own 2 of them now a medium and a medium/heavy. Both have worked as anyone would hope. I use them only for bass fishing. I've caught 3-4 lb bass numerous times as well as much smaller weight bass and these rods hold up. I fish nearly every weekend and I've had these rods for months. They truly are a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for cheap cost
customer_reviews.text: Always go with the cherry rod from Berkley for the durability, cost, and the style of which are always on point. Just wish there was a steel head salmon rod on this style
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rods
customer_reviews.text: I own about 30 rods and these cherrywoods are the best I have found. Cheap and work very well. I have 5 now in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish

customer_reviews.title: It's a fine rod.
customer_reviews.text: Hundred dollar rods are nice but it's silly to pay that much when you can get these or a Berkley Lightning rod.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sockwell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the price. Better feel and lighter weight than an ugly stik.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie'O

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Berkley Cherrywood HD rods are a great value. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Good Rod Bad Guides and Eyelets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these for trolling crankbaita for crappie and perch. The rod itself is a good rod for my purposes however, the guides leave a lot to be desired. The eyelet inserts pop out and the guides themselves are very flimsy. As this becomes more of an issue with the right I have purchased I will replace them with a better manufactured product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Freuler

customer_reviews.title: good rods fair price
customer_reviews.text: was on time n well packaged. easy to set up. have a couple of these rods n have held up well. would buy again here.
customer_reviews.author: william duffield

customer_reviews.title: hard to find med light casting rods under $100 price range
customer_reviews.text: its decent. hard to find med light casting rods under $100 price range. works well, however it is inexpensive, so i am not sure how much abuse it will take. so like I have said many times, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mackrel

customer_reviews.title: this rod is great i wasn't paying attention when buying and didn't realize ...
customer_reviews.text: this rod is great i wasn't paying attention when buying and didn't realize it was a one piece but considering my rods stay assembled 99.9% of the time. good long casts with this and the kastking Royale Legend.
customer_reviews.author: Max Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price, i will keep buying them been using Berkeley since I was a teen 30 yrs ago
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made. Dissatisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product at all. It broke about my 4th time fishing with it. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fishing Rod
customer_reviews.text: A great fishing rod for someone on a budget. From a beginner, to an avid fisherman - I would consider this product to be a long-lasting, and durable rod to start with. I paired this with an Abu Garcia Revo SX casting reel, and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Burns Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great pole, lightweight... My husband was thrilled, but was delivered snapped in two.
customer_reviews.text: Could someone please contact me regarding this pole? It was delivered broken. I'd like to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problem pulling in this nice 32” halibut
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Fish lips ×10
customer_reviews.text: Turned it into spinning rod. Caught ten fish first day. Then two rainbows in a stream. Me likey. Fairly accurate casts.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Aliu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the rod and it's kind of sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot rod!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these rods for years, quality rods at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: 101st Airborne Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Mostly misses
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a little to long and on thin side as a result I am having trouble hitting the flies..and I consider myself a person with good hand and eye coordination..but now the flies seem to be taking over the house
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for trolling for those big browns! Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Norwood

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Although I only used it a few times then sold it with a reel.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know why anyone would give this rod lower ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why anyone would give this rod lower than 5 stars for the price point this is a freaking buy... buy it now.... I’m ordering 3 more...
customer_reviews.author: J dub

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for price!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad rod for the price. A little heavy if you are jigging. But for Texas or Carolina rigging does the job.
customer_reviews.author: David Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Got it mainly for my kids and nephews to use as they are new to fishing and has held up great against them. I found myself using them more often then them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboi

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Even experts. I use this for creek fishing for right casting spaces.
customer_reviews.author: alvaro p.

customer_reviews.title: High quality fishing rod.
customer_reviews.text: This rod is nice and ridged, to bring in the big ones.
customer_reviews.author: Docdreaded

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod... No Damage or Any Hassles...
customer_reviews.text: Great Rod... I have this and an ugly stik... Like them both. No damage when received... UPS always a hang up leaving stuff like always. But I got it before my trip to the coast.
customer_reviews.author: ava76

customer_reviews.title: Packing lacking
customer_reviews.text: Product looks fine but a with lack of packaging. The rod came in a cardboard box with the only protection being a super thin plastic sleeve on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Waited a bit for this rod to come in just to open it up and see it is broken in two. Nope folks this was Supposed to be a one piece rod .
customer_reviews.author: Cooptastic

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rod
customer_reviews.text: Coupled with a Zebco Platnium 33 easily handled some larger LM and SM bass. Build quality seems good for this price point. Chopped the handle down as it was a bit too long for my taste when kayak fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You dont have to break the bank to catch Bass!
customer_reviews.text: Dont let the price fool you .These are really good rods . I have some rods that are not cheap .They dont feel any better then this rod . Fishing is going the same way as everything else , hype ,hype , hype !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sean marshall

customer_reviews.title: Rod snapped after catching a 2.5lb bass
customer_reviews.text: The top half of the rod snapped after catching a 2.5 pound bass, the first fish of the day, and the only one for this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cannnon

customer_reviews.title: The quality is the best for these rods
customer_reviews.text: These rods are by far the best for the money. The quality and feel are the best of any 6’6” rods on the market today...
customer_reviews.author: Ray F.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay for this rod, you can’t beat it. Probably buy another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Dezimon Brooks

customer_reviews.title: They work great for the way I use them
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional fishing guide. I now own four of these. They work great for the way I use them. I'll most likely buy some more next spring.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ekroot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Caught a couple 2-5 lb bass on it no problem
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use
customer_reviews.text: I use these for trolling for white bass. If I hang up and break one it isn't a big financial loss. Plus I have a bunch of kids that use them.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the money! I will probably be buying a few more in the near future!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The Rod is wonderful...No complaints thus far. I can not believe how fast I got it. Today is the 24th and it wasn't supposed to shop until the 28th to 31st but to my surprise it was there waiting when I got home this afternoon. I would Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good rod. Great Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with about 4 inches broken off the tip of the rod. Amazon returns are a breeze and a new one was at my house 2 days later. Rod itself is solid and quite decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HoosierDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Love this rod
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod for the price it can't be beat. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: nickm

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: Broke after I used it 2 times. Got snagged on kelp and the rod broke before the 10lb line broke
customer_reviews.author: Victor Flores

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this Rod is the weight other than that I have bought five one broke on the First cast 1 broke in half after a bass tournament I will never buy these again
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Red fishing rig
customer_reviews.text: Its a real good pole. I salt and fresh water fish with it. Second day oht i caught. A 4ft. Bull shark in it. With not probelms. Have a black max abu Garcia bait caster reel on it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew  goodman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking rods
customer_reviews.text: Good looking rods. I have not used them yet but first look ....they appear to be as described and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frisby

customer_reviews.title: Rod broke
customer_reviews.text: Rod snapped in two places pulling a 30 inch pike out of the water. Look closely at the picture. Gave it two stars vs one because it’s a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad. S

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality rod. I find that it has a fast action and the weight is perfect for bass and catfish. I couldn't find a better deal anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great Rod. Perfect for my baitcaster.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: First time out it broke, setting the hook on a 3oz white perch. 7ft medium heavy rod broke on a 3oz white perch, after the laughter(my buddies) we threw it in the trash at the fish camp.
customer_reviews.author: DatphatBear

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite rod, not much to say except it performed better than expected and this is my main pole now.
customer_reviews.author: frymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Geeat rods
customer_reviews.text: These are very good fishing rods. Woukd definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper58

customer_reviews.title: Pole broke after using it two times
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk I used it a couple times and within a month the tip broke off. Poorly made just bent the little bit and it broke right off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not your fathers cane pole
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flexibility and balance for a moderately proceed and more traditional rod. The line guides are nicely placed.
customer_reviews.author: KC'SAPUNK

product_meta.title: Berkley Cherrywood HD Casting Rod
product_meta.description: A Berkley favorite for over 30 years, redefined. Hybrid design construction delivers un-matched sensitivity with the grip and tactile features of a cork handle make this Cherrywood the best one yet.
feature_bullets: Hybrid design construction for un-matched sensitivity with the security of through handle construction
SS304 Guides - 20x tougher and 55% lighter than traditional aluminum oxide guides and are factory tested for dependability
Cork handle design for added comfort and grip
